name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy JIRA Issue Link As Markdown

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to copy a link to the currently open JIRA ticket as formatted markdown

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy a link to the current JIRA ticket in an easy-to-share markdown format.

For example: `[TEST-3301](https://mycompany.atlassian.net/browse/TEST-3301) My test ticket`
